message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of training overhead in Massive MIMO systems, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT) and networked systems (cs.NI). The proposed solution involves optimizing the training scheme based on the heterogeneous Doppler spread of users, which is a system-level optimization problem (cs.SY). The paper also deals with the problem of location estimation, which is a topic related to machine learning (cs.LG) and multimedia (cs.MM) applications.
